price: Дар он рӯз ҳар касро корест, ки ӯро ба худ машғул медорад
arabic: لِكُلِّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ شَأۡنٞ يُغۡنِيهِ

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: likulli im'ri-in min'hum yawma-idhin shanun yugh'nīhi
